results.title: Investigation of simvastatin-induced apoptosis and cell cycle arrest in cancer stem cells of MCF-7.
results.text_hl: AIMS: This study has been designed to investigation the anticancer effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Breast_and_Ovarian_Cancer_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D061325 @@@breast@@@ CSCs.

citations.NLM: Afzali M, Vatankhah M, Ostad SN. Investigation of simvastatin-induced apoptosis and cell cycle arrest in cancer stem cells of MCF-7. J Cancer Res Ther. 2016 Apr-Jun;12(2):725-30. PMID: 27461641

results.title: Golf-inhibiting gynecomastia associated with atorvastatin therapy.
results.text_hl: We describe the development of @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Breast_and_Ovarian_Cancer_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D061325 @@@breast enlargement and tenderness@@@ in a 52-year-old Caucasian man 6 months after his @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy had been switched to @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Hammons KB, Edwards RF, Rice WY. Golf-inhibiting gynecomastia associated with atorvastatin therapy. Pharmacotherapy. 2006 Aug;26(8):1165-8. PMID: 16863492
citations.BibTeX: @article{16863492, title={Golf-inhibiting gynecomastia associated with atorvastatin therapy.}, author={Hammons KB and Edwards RF and Rice WY}, journal={Pharmacotherapy}, volume={26}, number={8}, pages={1165-8}}
